thread.title: Emirates FA Cup semi-final draw details
thread.title_full: Emirates FA Cup semi-final draw details

title: Emirates FA Cup semi-final draw details
text:
Search the entire site Emirates FA Cup semi-final draw details 
We will find out who we will face in Emirates FA Cup semi-finals when the draw is made on Monday 
We booked our place in a record 29th semi-final as we beat National League side Lincoln City 5-0 at Emirates Stadium on Saturday. 
We have been allocated ball No 4 in the draw, which takes place from 9.30pm (UK time). 
The semi-final ties will be played across the weekend of April 22-23, 2017. 
Follow @Arsenal on Twitter for news of the FA Cup draw and stay close to Arsenal.com for ticket information. 
More quizzes coming soon! Copyright 2017 The Arsenal Football Club plc.
